title: Inside the lab where Canadian Tire is developing thousands of new gadgets
summary: Canadian Tire is launching thousands of new and revamped products as part of a strategy to increase sales of its higher-margin private brands. The company has been testing a raccoon-proof garbage and compost bin accessory, which is an example of green innovation. Canadian Tire is also working to improve the quality of its own products and push into a wider range of price points.
product_or_process: raccoon-proof garbage and compost bin accessory

title: 10 Best Slim/Thin Laptops in India 2024 - Sleek And Light
summary: Here is a summary of the article. The Apple Macbook Air M1 is the best overall laptop with its sleek design and efficient performance. Some of the best features of the laptop are its super-thin and light design at only 2.8 pounds, a stunning retina display, all day battery life, and seamless integration with other Apple devices. Some of the higher priced models feature an impressive 16-core Neural Engine.
